DOC.brief_summary: This trial compare innovate stimulation parameter , intermittent Theta Burst Stimulation , standard high frequency stimulation protocol . The Left dorsolateral prefrontal cortex , target MRI navigation site stimulation treatment condition . The study seek determine superiority therapeutic efficacy iTBS protocol compare conventional one .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Intermittent ThetaBurst Stimulation Compared 10 Hz Stimulation Dorsolateral Prefrontal Cortex Treatment Resistant Major Depressive Disorder : Double-blind Randomized Study
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year 75 year Both gender eligible Volontary able give consent Major depressive episode ( MADRS > 20 ) single recurrent Resistance least 2 antidepressant , Treated antidepressant efficient stable posology since 6 week Initiation modification antidepressant drug Neurodegenerative diseas Bipolar I , II disorder Schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , schizophreniform , delusional disorder , current psychotic symptom Substance abuse past 15 day Substance dependence wean Benzodiazepine anticonvulsant rTMS treatment course ECT failure medical history Contraindication rTMS MRI Pregnancy Difficulty obtain informed consent
